Package View

Class CardsBuilder

java.lang.Object
View.CardsBuilder
public class CardsBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
handles the adding and removing of cards and its graphics to the game
Author:
Tobias Celik, Hoang An Tran, Simon Wiethase

  • Constructor Details

    • CardsBuilder

      public CardsBuilder​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane allCards, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane programmingCards, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane damageCards)
      initialises the cards with its own resources
      Parameters:
      allCards - a 9x1 grid that will be populated with cards
      programmingCards - a 5x1 grid that will be populated with the selected cards
      damageCards - the additional input used to add damage cards to the grid

  • Method Details

    • setCard

      public void setCard​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane, java.lang.String card, int index)
      inserts a card addressed by its name into the index of an grid
      Parameters:
      gridPane - the cards grid to insert into
      card - the card name
      index - the position to insert into
